languages.text: "Не тратьте красноречие, Ваша Светлость, не договоримся мы. Да и на что вам я в вашей войне?"
"Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
languages.original_text: "Не тратьте красноречие, Ваша Светлость, не договоримся мы. Да и на что вам я в вашей войне?"

traits.locale_text: "Don't waste your eloquence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use will I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Don't waste your eloquence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use will I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Don't waste your eloquence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use will I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Don't waste your eloquence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use will I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “别再浪费口舌了，大人，我们是不会帮你们这个忙的。而且，这是你们之间的战争，我又能帮得上什么忙呢？”
languages.original_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"

traits.locale_text: “别再浪费口舌了，大人，我们是不会帮你们这个忙的。而且，这是你们之间的战争，我又能帮得上什么忙呢？”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下、雄弁なのはわかりましたが、我々には折合いなど付かないでしょう。それにこの戦争で、私が何の役に立つというのです？」
languages.original_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、雄弁なのはわかりましたが、我々には折合いなど付かないでしょう。それにこの戦争で、私が何の役に立つというのです？」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «No desperdicie su labia conmigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No vamos a llegar a un acuerdo. ¿Y de qué serviré en esta guerra suya de todos modos?».
languages.original_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"

traits.locale_text: «No desperdicie su elocuencia, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No vamos a llegar a un acuerdo. ¿Y de qué serviré en esta guerra suya de todos modos?».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Vergeudet Eure Eloquenz nicht auf mich, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir werden keine Einigung erzielen. Und was würde ich in Eurem Krieg auch groß helfen?"
languages.original_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"

traits.locale_text: "Vergeudet Eure Eloquenz nicht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir werden keine Einigung erzielen. Und was würde ich in Eurem Krieg auch groß helfen?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Ne gaspillez pas votre salive, Votre Seigneurie, on n'arrivera pas à trouver un accord. De toute manière, je ne vois pas bien comment je pourrais vous aider dans votre guerre. »
languages.original_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne gaspillez pas votre salive, Votre Seigneurie, on n'arrivera pas à trouver un accord. De toute manière, je ne vois pas bien comment je pourrais vous aider dans votre guerre. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Tatlı dilinizi benim için yormayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Anlaşmamıza imkân yok. Üstelik bu savaşta ne işinize yarayacağım ben?"
languages.original_text: "Don't waste your silver tongue on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We're not going to come to an agreement. And what use would I be in this war of yours, anyway?"
